description:
The mountaineering club is a lot of fun, but not everyone was into the idea at first glance. Some people need a more comprehensive introduction!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Challenge from the Mountaineering Club!? / Tough Love on Mt. Buko?
Tozan Bu kara no Chousen!? / Bukousan de Ai no Muchi?
登山部からの挑戦!? / 武甲山で愛のムチ?
